Springboro Ordinances

Codified Ordinances of Springboro, Ohio

Download this project as a .zip file Download this project as a tar.gz file

CHAPTER 1278 Nonconforming Uses

1278.01Intent. 1278.02Incompatibility of nonconforming uses; extension or enlargement. 1278.03Buildings under construction. 1278.04Nonconforming lots of record. 1278.05Nonconforming lots of record in combination. 1278.06Nonconforming uses of land. 1278.07Nonconforming structures. 1278.08Nonconforming uses of structures or of structures and land in combination. 1278.09Repairs and maintenance. 1278.10Conditional uses. 1278.11Limited relief from restrictions available to nonconforming business or industrial uses or structures in business or industrial districts.

CROSS REFERENCES

Zoning Board of Appeals - see CHTR. Secs. 1262.13 et seq.

Zoning certificates required for nonconforming uses - see P.& Z. 1262.21

Variances from Zoning Code - see P.& Z. 1262.21
